To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private SuperTrend _str;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_str = STR(symbol, period, multiplier);

// In OnData()
if (_str.IsReady)
{
    var basicUpperBand = _str.BasicUpperBand.Current.Value;
    var basicLowerBand = _str.BasicLowerBand.Current.Value;
    var currentTrailingUpperBand = _str.CurrentTrailingUpperBand.Current.Value;
    var currentTrailingLowerBand = _str.CurrentTrailingLowerBand.Current.Value;
    var current = _str.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.str = self.STR(symbol, period, multiplier)

# In OnData()
if self.str.IsReady:
    basic_upper_band = self.str.BasicUpperBand.Current.Value
    basic_lower_band = self.str.BasicLowerBand.Current.Value
    current_trailing_upper_band = self.str.CurrentTrailingUpperBand.Current.Value
    current_trailing_lower_band = self.str.CurrentTrailingLowerBand.Current.Value
    current = self.str.Current.Value
